long_description: The Exped Comfort MegaMat 10 LXW sleeping pad is mega big and mega warm. Ideal for car camping, the 4 in. of padding gives you a luxurious night's sleep. Laminated polyester surface fabric is durable, airtight and humidity resistant; nonslip finish keeps you on the pad. Uses high-grade open-cell polyurethane foam for efficient warmth; horizontal air channels cored through foam make mats extremely lightweight. Features 2 wide, low-profile, FlatValves for inflation and deflation; pad self-inflates, but to top off, inflate with the included minipump. Intake valve features a built-in flap to prevent air escaping when inflating; flap can be released to let a little air out when finding that ideal comfort zone. High-frequency welded seams create airtight construction. Includes stuff sack for protection during transportation. The Exped Comfort MegaMat sleeping pad includes repair kit with adhesive and fabric patches. LXW = Long eXtra Wide.
